questiontext.text: From each of two normally distributed populations with equal variances a sample is drawn.______________. Sample 1: n = 18, mean = 46, sd = 8.01 Sample 2: n = 18, mean = 48, sd = 10.28. The pooled variance estimator takes the value 84.92. It is tested Whether the population averages are equal. The corresponding test size follows, if the null hypothesis is TRUE,

answer.text: A T distribution with 34 degrees of freedom

feedback.text: A T-distribution with 34 degrees of freedom: Correct

answer.text: A T distribution with 36 degrees of freedom

feedback.text: A T-division with 36 degrees of freedom: Incorrect

answer.text: An F-division with 18 and 18 degrees of freedom

feedback.text: An F-division with 18 and 18 degrees of freedom: Incorrect

answer.text: An F-division with 17 and 17 degrees of freedom

feedback.text: An F-division with 17 and 17 degrees of freedom: Incorrect
